column4: anybody ever have eth0 and eth1 just disappear on a reboot and never come back?
can it be a switch on your laptop?
anyway your ethernet shouldn't go away
the lights don't even blink on the pcmcia card
dmesg doesn't even register ejecting and reinserting the card
were you using ndiswrapper? does lsmod show it?
as the source of the problem i mean
is it localized so just network stuff that no longer shows? sound works?
sounds, networking, parallel, serial, usb, etc still works.  eth0 and eth1  are gone
nope   http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/32458/      it is not in the boot messages, dmesg, ifconfig -a, /etc/init.d/networking restart ...
